name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The id of the notification in the database.

name: type
description: Description: The type of event that resulted in the notification.

name: created_at
description: Description: The timestamp of the notification.

name: account
description: Description: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.

name: status OPTIONAL
description: Description: Status that was the object of the notification. Attached when type of the notification is favourite, reblog, status, mention, poll, or update.

name: report OPTIONAL
description: Description: Report that was the object of the notification. Attached when type of the notification is admin.report.
